movies.title: Pinocchio
movies.plot: Geppetto the carpenter carves the object of his hidden desires out of a log: a puppet that will keep him company and will be like a son to him. He will call him Pinocchio. Imagine his surprise when he discovers that the puppet moves, as if by magic, and is gifted with a life on its own.
movies.simplePlot: Geppetto the carpenter carves the object of his hidden desires out of a log: a puppet that will keep him company and will be like a son to him. He will call him Pinocchio. Imagine his ...

biography.bio: Gabriele Caprio is an actor, known for Pinocchio (2012), La mia famiglia a soqquadro (2017) and Una buona stagione (2014).
biography.name: Gabriele Caprio

biography.bio: Mino Caprio was born on November 17, 1955 in Rome, Lazio, Italy as Guglielmo Caprio. He is known for his work on Pinocchio (2012), La verità sta in cielo (2016) and The Chronicles of Narnia: The Lion, the Witch and the Wardrobe (2005).
biography.name: Mino Caprio

biography.bio: Maricla Affatato is an actress and producer, known for Pinocchio (2012), Momo (2001) and Opopomoz (2003).
biography.name: Maricla Affatato

biography.bio: Maurizio Micheli was born on February 3, 1947 in Livorno, Tuscany, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Allegro non troppo (1976), Quo vado? (2016) and Valzer (2007).
biography.name: Maurizio Micheli

biography.bio: Rocco Papaleo was born on August 16, 1958 in Lauria, PZ, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Basilicata Coast to Coast (2010), Escort in Love (2011) and The Graduates (1995).
biography.name: Rocco Papaleo

biography.bio: Almost a high school drop out in his senior year, Paolino loves cinema, especially the one of the 70s. He also loves the actors and directors of that period: Steven Spielberg, Joe D'Amato, Martin Scorsese, Ruggero Deodato, Umberto Lenzi, etc... He appeared in several commercials and in the movie "Ovosodo" by Paolo Virzi'. He hosted various local festivals in his hometown Livorno (Tuscany, Italy). He also worked as entertainer on cruise ships and mountain resorts. According to Paolino, the greatest philosophers of all times are Saint Augustine ("Love and do what you want") and Charlie Chaplin ("A day without laughing is a wasted day"). He literally adores Articolo 31 (Italian rap band), anime, spaghetti. He also collects VHS.
biography.name: Paolo Ruffini

biography.bio: Lucrezia Marricchi is an actress, known for Pinocchio (2012).
biography.name: Lucrezia Marricchi

biography.bio: Carlo Valli was born on October 4, 1943 in Asti, Piedmont, Italy. He is known for his work on Pinocchio (2012), Le leggi del desiderio (2015) and Viens chez moi, j'habite chez une copine (1981). He is married to Cristina Giachero. They have two children.
biography.name: Carlo Valli

biography.bio: Pino Quartullo was born on July 12, 1957 in Civitavecchia, Lazio, Italy. He is an actor and writer, known for Le donne non vogliono più (1993), Quando eravamo repressi (1992) and Le faremo tanto male (1998). He has been married to Margherita Romaniello since 2010.
biography.name: Pino Quartullo

biography.bio: Riccardo Rossi was born on November 9, 1963 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on Il était une fois en Amérique (1984), Torneranno i prati (2014) and Pinocchio (2012).
biography.name: Riccardo Rossi

biography.bio: Dario Penne was born on February 17, 1938 in Trieste, Italy. He is known for his work on Pinocchio (2012), Max e Hélène (2015) and RoboCop (1987).
biography.name: Dario Penne

biography.bio: Andy Luotto was born on July 30, 1950 in Brooklyn, New York, USA as André Paul Luotto. He is an actor and writer, known for Canone inverso - Making Love (2000), The Truce (1997) and Grunt! (1983). He is married to Antonella. They have three children.
biography.name: Andy Luotto

biography.bio: Lucio Dalla was born on March 4, 1943 in Bologna, Italy. He died on March 1, 2012 in Montreux, Riviera-Pays-d'Enhaut, Vaud, Switzerland.
biography.name: Lucio Dalla

biography.bio: Teo Bellia was born on January 17, 1960 in Rome, Lazio, Italy. He is known for his work on Pinocchio (2012), The Murder of a General (2007) and La nascita (2006).
biography.name: Teo Bellia

biography.bio: Enzo Avolio is an actor, known for Pinocchio (2012), L'avvocato Porta (1997) and 00 - Zero Zero 3D (2011).
biography.name: Enzo Avolio

awards.award: Italian National Syndicate of Film Journalists 2013
